name: OverPopul(arN)ation
description:
Your population is expending fast.

Manage it well in order to avoid a pandemia.

Controls : drag and drop with the mouse.

Buildings :

     -  Nuclear power plant : drop it people to produce money

     - Hospital : drop it sick people to block the spreading of the sickman virus

     - House : drop it people to increase your max population (be careful to to it first in order to not lose the game)

This game has been made for the 3hours long trijam#169.
